Instruction: Preheat a cast iron skillet over high heat.
Combine paprika, salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and thyme in a small bowl.
Pat catfish fillets dry with paper towels.
Generously coat both sides of catfish fillets with the spice mixture.
Melt butter in the hot skillet.
Place catfish fillets in the hot skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Serve immediately with your favorite side dishes.
